name: ODDHEAD
description:
ODDHEAD

Join this wonderfull world and try to reveal the Intruder.

Move with the arrow keys and click on the suspect, pay attention !

The intruder may have various characteristics, you can see them using the question mark button.

It's a game made by Juliax (graph) and BastinusRex (dev)!          https://www.artstation.com/kokoala23                      https://www.artstation.com/maluzo

 During a 48h game jam, the theme was : " Now you see me (?) "
